body.p: The Gentoo/AMD64 LiveCD images are available from Official Gentoo Mirrors. The latest available stage and LiveCD downloads are currently:
There are three ISO's available -- minimal, uiniversal and packages:

ul.li: minimal is a bootable LiveCD only with documentation. Stage tarballs are not included.
universal is a bootable LiveCD with documentation, stage tarballs, portage snapshot, and selected distfiles.
packages contains the GRP binaries for ebuilds like GNOME, KDE, OpenOffice, etc.
